query: SELECT id, studentId, DATE_FORMAT(measureDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as measureDate, weight, bodyFat, waist, bmi FROM measurements WHERE studentId = 1 ORDER BY measureDate DESC;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3TwTEpp3aQwpk4j.26ab54900c35 --database SFH8sqABSCK5KntMvXXcPM --execute SELECT id, studentId, DATE_FORMAT(measureDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as measureDate, weight, bodyFat, waist, bmi FROM measurements WHERE studentId = 1 ORDER BY measureDate DESC;
